data.name: Agent Venom
data.description: Disabled veteran Flash Thompson volunteered to be bonded with the Venom symbiote, combining his mastery of weaponry with symbiote savagery to deal massive damage to their enemies.

starItems.name: Agent Venom
starItems.description: Disabled veteran Flash Thompson volunteered to be bonded with the Venom symbiote, combining his mastery of weaponry with symbiote savagery to deal massive damage to their enemies.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on the primary target

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
On Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

On any Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets instead

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Chain to an additional adjacent target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

On any Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Chain to an additional adjacent target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

On any Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Chain to an additional adjacent target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On any Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

2.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip a positive effect to negative effect on primary target on each attack

3.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip a positive effect to a negative effect on each attack.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing on all attacks
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time

4.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip a positive effect to a negative effect on each attack.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to flip a positive effect to negative effect on primary target on each attack
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing

5.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to flip a positive effect to a negative effect on each attack.
5.nextUpgrade: Always flip a positive effect to negative effect on primary target on each attack

6.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip a positive effect to a negative effect on each attack.

7.description:
Attack primary target <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip a positive effect to a negative effect on each attack.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> additional damage for each positive and negative effect on the primary target

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>30%</color> additional damage for each positive and negative effect on the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on Crit, repeat this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on this character or <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally Block, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on this character or <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally Block, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on this character or <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally Block, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on this character or <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally Block, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, on this character or <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally Block, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
